A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is just terrible movie making.  Regardless of what you think of any of the character decisions\, plot holes\, and dialogue\, this is simply a badly written\, badly edited movie.  I've never been honestly bored by a Star Wars movie before\, but this crew managed it.  So many pointless scenes and undercutting of inherent drama when they do hit on a good moment.  I hope these writers never work again.  Disney needs to take a hard look at how they are handling the franchise.  Golden geese have limits\, no matter how big they are.  Don't treat Star Wars like Transformers.
